column4: please enlight me with this, i have 3.06 ghz processor, but in cpuinfo it say only 1600 mhz, is it normal ? is it got something to do with clockmod or speedstep things ?
finally some respond :), yes on what normal, speetstep or clockmod things ?
ubuntu has powernowd enabled by default which "underclocks" your chip to save power and noise. if your usage goes above 95% or so it will kick up to 3ghz again
thank you so much for you info, one more thing what is this bogomips things ?
